code: import axios from"axios";const apiURL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;export const getUserById=async uId=>{try{let res=await axios.post(`${apiURL}/api/user/signle-user`,{uId});return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const updatePersonalInformationFetch=async userData=>{try{let res=await axios.post(`${apiURL}/api/user/edit-user`,userData);return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const getOrderByUser=async uId=>{try{let res=await axios.post(`${apiURL}/api/order/order-by-user`,{uId});return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const updatePassword=async formData=>{try{let res=await axios.post(`${apiURL}/api/user/change-password`,formData);return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};
